1.content:
Hello and welcome to the Alvin and the Chipmunks Vore story.

First of you need to choose which version of the chipmunks you want.

What is your choice?
1.title: First Choice

121.content: You are hungry, who are you?
121.title: The Chipmunks Household

choices: Start off with some normal food
Gulp down a fan or service worker
Go for a family member or friend
1211.content:
You lean back on the personalized beanbag, fuzzy rear sinking into the plush red seat. With a yawn of boredom, you toss your game controller aside as you look down in annoyance at your belly. Life as a rockstar had put some extra weight on your tiny chipmunk frame and a low grumble from your gut indicated it needed more.

"Damn I'm hungry" you mutter as you absentmindedly rub your stomach. After a second of thought, you decide enough is enough. You're a star, a treasure and you need to be satisfied. The only question is what will be your meal?
1211.title: Alvin

122.content: You are hungry, who are you?
122.title: The Chipettes Household

123.content: You are hungry, who are you?
123.title: Fans/Normal People

info.brief_description: A vore story involving the Alvin and the Chipmunks and Chipettes.
info.description:
You are entering an interactive story based on Alvin and the Chipmunks Cartoon/Movies. This is a vore story. Don't kill any characters.

There are just a few rules:

0.- You cant Kill the Characters. Hard Vore, Digestion and Absorption are Okay. If they die they have to come back;
1.- All types of vore are fine (Preferably Anal Vore);
2.- Scat is Allowed: (Poop, Farts, etc...);
3.- No Growth or Shrinking. If the Chipmunks want to eat a normal person, they can. They dont need to grow/shrink;
4.- Sex is allowed between everybody;
5.- Entries will be deleted for Bad Grammar and Spelling;
6.- Completely non-nonsensical storylines and going offtopic will be deleted;
7.- Have fun.
info.pretty_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks Vore Interactive
